channel.title: [PI] Making an object give you Donator Status?
channel.description: How would i go about doing this? Would i make a public void in playerassistant and connect it to something in itemassistant or what? i dont know what to do... O.o

item.title: [PI] Making an object give you Donator Status?
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

Try the firstclickobject void in your actionhandler.

It would be something like this :

case:xxxx:
c.isDonator = 1;
c.sendMessage("You are now a donator");
break;

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Making an object give you Donator Status?
